comments: The command might be better described as 'pause DMA'
The actual effect is apparently to enable the amplifier on the card. When the speaker is off, the audio output might sound like a quiet crackle
A better title might be 'resume DMA'
lo hi = 16-bit little Endian value containing (length of DMA block - 1)
